summary: This bill, H.R. 5100, aims to extend the Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) and Small Business Technology Transfer (STTR) programs. It proposes to amend various sections of the Small Business Act, specifically modifying dates related to the programs' authorization and activities, including deadlines for SBIR/STTR funding and pilot programs. The extensions affect multiple facets of these programs, such as phase flexibility, commercialization readiness, accelerated awards, administrative assistance, and performance standards.
